ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Great EQ Computer?
ygData.msgSnippet: Generally brand name computers are problematic. It s sometimes best to have a computer built. Avoid Compaqs like the plague. E-machines I hear are another to
ygData.messageBody:
Generally brand name computers are problematic. It's sometimes best to have
a computer built.
Avoid Compaqs like the plague. E-machines I hear are another to avoid. I
have a pionex and it isn't bad. My dad got an HP and it's pretty cool but
had alot of problems at first.
Check out techtv.com it'll have info on good gaming machines.
luv,
-Su

> I will be buying a computer in a few months and am wondering what some of
> you people use to play EQ. Going to spend a good bit so anyone have any
> suggestions for GREAT eq computer (that's about all I do with the computer
> play EQ, Web and MP3's). Anyone have any ideas?
>
> Mu
>
> Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com
